text.par1: Hi! My name is Andrew and i'm front end developer
text.par2: In early 2016 i holds master degree in radiotechnics from National Technical University of Ukraine “Igor Sikorsky Kyiv Polytechnic Institute”. After six months of work in the specialty i understand than this is ”not mine”. So i started search what i really want to do. After long searching and thinking, i accidentally opened for my self web development. And after a year and a half learning ang struggling in searching new job, i finally had my first offer as a front end developer.
text.par3: So, in early 2018 my IT-career was started:) Now i work in MGID inc. and create web application using Angular, native JS, HTML5, CSS3.
